EmailTemplate.subject: Protect Your Investment with Kellstrom Defense
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://www.kellstromdefense.com/]]>
C-130 solutions at competitive industry pricing
Obsolescence mitigation with built-in Quality and compliance are of utmost importance to C-130 Operators. Honeywell Authorized Distributor and Service Center Kellstrom Defense has an extensive portfolio of Honeywell-based solutions to obsolescence of systems. Extending the useful life of your aircraft is attainable with Honeywell-based solutions like Kellstrom’s exclusive SHORT-POD® APU Upgrade kit, E2H ECS®, Honeywell’s own T56 Oil Cooler, Starter, Starter Control Valve, Generator, Generator Disconnect, etc., all used to modernize components or systems on C-130B through early C-130-H. Kellstrom Defense can establish short and long term program packages customizable to specific sustainment requirements and budget limitations. Plus, as a Honeywell Certified Repair Station, you can expect top performing parts and services. Check out Kellstrom’s extensive library of product and service briefs to learn more about cost savings offering.
DOWNLOAD PRODUCT BRIEFS <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Kellstrom_C130.html?utm_source=email&utm_campaign=18_channelamericas_d&s]]>
